DOC.brief_summary: This study aim investigate impact colonic fermentation intrinsic indigestible carbohydrate cereal whole kernel three day consumption , metabolic variable cognition . The study perform healthy , normal slightly over-weight test subject .
DOC.brief_title: Prebiotics Means Modulate Gut Fermentation , Metabolism , Appetite Cognition
